summary: Ale is a transvestite that collects cardboard. One day she finds Mia's diary, a woman who died and left her husband and daughter Julia. A movie about discrimination and intolerance.
cast: Martina Knopoff|Camila Sosa Villada|Maite Lanata|Silvia Villazur|Rodrigo De la Serna|Miguel Israilevich|Naty Menstrual|Romina Escobar|Rocío Rocha|Karen Cabanillas|Susy Shock|Dana Trinidad|Rodolfo Prantte|Carlos Cano|Tatiana Giménez|Mariano González|Rosana Moscato|Élida Schinocca|María Inés Aldaburu|Mariel Núñez|Fernando Ritucci|Lorena Vega|Diego Echegoyen|Antonella Caballero|Flora Gró|Celeste Cid

title: Mía
